duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with project staff, subcontract engineering firms, internal and external customers to conceptualize, design, bid, and execute projects.
Develop and implement contingency plans to address specific executional needs.
Create accurate estimates and project scopes.
Manage cost, quality, schedule, and communication plans.
Build strong customer relationship network and act as a subject-matter expert for all aspects of contract services and contractual obligations.
Prepare periodic progress and cost reports, presentations, and required documentation for contract deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Engineering or related field or 10+ years equivalent experience (Professional Engineer (PE) Preferred)
